metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5158 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in vringh_kiov_advance in drivers/vhost/vringh.c in the host side of a virtio ring in the Linux Kernel. This issue may result in a denial of service from guest to host via zero length descriptor.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
